responses.text: Hi there! I'm Nizar’s AI Assistant, ready to answer questions about his AI, data science, and MERN stack projects, skills, or career journey!
Hello! Welcome to Nizar’s portfolio. Ask me about his AI-driven projects, MERN stack apps, or professional experience!

Nizar excels in Python, R, Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL, MongoDB, and Streamlit. He’s skilled in statistical analysis, data visualization, data mining, Power BI, Tableau, and MERN stack development, with strong problem-solving and collaboration abilities.

Nizar’s toolkit includes programming (Python, R, Java), web development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MERN stack), databases (MySQL, MongoDB), and analytics (Power BI, Tableau, Streamlit). He’s also proficient in critical thinking and teamwork.

Nizar’s projects include Healthy Train (real-time train health dashboard), AetheriumAnalyzer (AI script analysis tool), CivicFix (MERN stack civic issue tracker), Creative Spark (AI creativity platform), AI-Powered Data Insight Portal, and MindAidPro (mental health chatbot). Explore them in the Projects section!

Nizar has developed projects like Healthy Train, AetheriumAnalyzer, CivicFix, Creative Spark, AI-Powered Data Insight Portal, and MindAidPro, showcasing his expertise in AI and MERN stack development. Want details on any specific project?

Healthy Train is a real-time dashboard monitoring railway train health using multi-sensor inputs. It achieves 87% anomaly detection accuracy for issues like overheating and vibration, using Node.js and Plotly.js for live visualizations.

AetheriumAnalyzer is an AI-powered web tool for script analysis, scoring scripts (0-100) and suggesting improvements for plot, characters, and dialogue. It features file upload support and a responsive neon-themed UI.

CivicFix is a full-stack MERN web application enabling citizens to report public issues like potholes and water leaks. It includes user authentication, image uploads, and an admin dashboard to enhance civic engagement.
Creative Spark is a MERN stack web app designed to boost creativity with AI-driven tools and challenges. It offers user login, registration, and feedback features for creative works.

The AI-Powered Data Insight Portal is a web app for analyzing and visualizing CSV data with AI-driven insights, offering interactive data preparation and multiple chart types for enhanced user experience.

MindAidPro is an AI-driven mental health chatbot using NLP models to provide personalized coping strategies and resource recommendations. Built with a Streamlit interface, it achieved 85% user satisfaction in beta testing.

Nizar interned as an AI & Computer Vision Intern at Trivy Technologies, developing real-time fight detection, unauthorized entry detection, and facial emotion recognition systems. He also worked as a Data Analytics Intern at Plasmid Innovations (Jul-Aug 2024) and a Marketing Intern at Skill Vertex (Aug-Sep 2023).

Nizar’s experience includes an AI & Computer Vision Internship at Trivy Technologies, a Data Analytics Internship at Plasmid Innovations, and a Marketing Internship at Skill Vertex, showcasing his skills in AI, analytics, and strategy.

At Trivy Technologies, Nizar developed real-time AI solutions for fight and violence detection, unauthorized entry detection, and facial emotion recognition, enhancing security and monitoring systems with computer vision models.
Nizar is pursuing a B.Tech in AI and Data Science at BSA Crescent Institute (2022-2026, CGPA: 9.4). He scored 93% in HSC (2022) and 98% in SSLC (2020) at St. Joseph AMHS School, Kallakurichi.

Nizar holds certifications in Responsive Web Design (freeCodeCamp), Game AI and Reinforcement Learning (Kaggle), Feature Engineering (Kaggle), Foundations of Cybersecurity (Coursera), and Campus Executive (Skill Vertex). Check them out in the Education section!
Reach Nizar at arnizz077@gmail.com, +919786083250, or on GitHub at mohamednizar17.
Nizar is ideal for AI, data science, and MERN stack development roles, with hands-on experience in real-time computer vision, analytics, and full-stack web applications.

Nizar, a final-year AI and Data Science student with a 9.4 CGPA, excels in Python, SQL, Power BI, and MERN stack development. His projects and internships at Trivy Technologies and Plasmid Innovations make him a strong candidate for AI and web development roles.
Nizar is passionate about AI, computer vision, and MERN stack development. He enjoys exploring real-time AI applications and solving complex problems in healthcare and transportation.
Nizar aims to advance AI, computer vision, and web development by building scalable solutions for real-world challenges in sectors like security, healthcare, and civic infrastructure.
Nizar uses Python, R, Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL, MongoDB, Power BI, Tableau, Streamlit, and Plotly.js for AI, data analysis, and full-stack MERN development.

Nizar’s AI expertise spans NLP, machine learning, computer vision, and statistical modeling. Projects like MindAidPro, AetheriumAnalyzer, and his Trivy Technologies internship highlight his real-world AI applications.
Nizar, a final-year student, is open to internships and projects in AI, computer vision, and MERN stack development. Reach him at arnizz077@gmail.com for opportunities!
I’m not sure I caught that! Could you ask about Nizar’s skills, projects, or internships? I’m here to help!
Hmm, I didn’t quite get that. Try asking about Nizar’s AI projects, MERN stack apps, or Trivy Technologies internship!
Oops, I might’ve missed something. Ask me about Nizar’s experience, education, or specific projects like CivicFix or Creative Spark!
